mapper.insert: insert into user (UserId, UserName, Password, Email, Phone, Slead, UserCreateTime, UserMark) values (#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{slead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usercreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{usermark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, Slead = #{slead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserCreateTime = #{usercreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UserMark = #{usermark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select UserId, UserName, Password, Email, Phone, Slead, UserCreateTime, UserMark from user
